actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $250 to $500 the tax deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers and to extend such deduction through 2013.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.
